headerDisplay: This plugin works with Enphase Envoy and are exposed to HomeKit as separate accessories and each needs to be manually paired. 1. Open the Home app on your device. 2. Tap the Home tab, then tap . 3. Tap *Add Accessory*, and select *I Don't Have a Code or Cannot Scan*. 4. Enter the Homebridge PIN, this can be found under the QR code in Homebridge UI or your Homebridge logs, alternatively you can select *Use Camera* and scan the QR code again.
footerDisplay: This plugin works with Enphase Envoy which is available [here](https://github.com/grzegorz914/homebridge-enphase-envoy).

installerUser.title: Installer user
installerUser.description: Here set installer user, default is - installer.

installerPasswd.title: Installer password
installerPasswd.description: Here set installer password, need to be generated, more info here: https://thecomputerperson.wordpress.com/2016/08/28/reverse-engineering-the-enphase-installer-toolkit/

enchargeStorageOffset.title: Encharge Storage energy offset
enchargeStorageOffset.description: Here set energy offset in (Wh) for Encharge Storage if nedded.

powerProductionMaxDetected.title: Power production max detected
powerProductionMaxDetected.description: Here set max Power production in (W) at which You get notyfication message.

energyProductionLifetimeOffset.title: Energy production lifetime offset
energyProductionLifetimeOffset.description: Here set energy production offset in (Wh) for lifetime energy if nedded.

powerConsumptionTotalMaxDetected.title: Total - Power consumption max detected
powerConsumptionTotalMaxDetected.description: Here set max Power consumption Total in (W) at which You get notyfication message.

energyConsumptionTotalLifetimeOffset.title: Total - Energy consumption lifetime offset
energyConsumptionTotalLifetimeOffset.description: Here set energy consumption offset in (Wh) for lifetime total energy if nedded.

powerConsumptionNetMaxDetected.title: Net - Power consumption max detected
powerConsumptionNetMaxDetected.description: Here set max Power consumption from Net in (W) at which You get notyfication message.

energyConsumptionNetLifetimeOffset.title: Net - Energy consumption lifetime offset
energyConsumptionNetLifetimeOffset.description: Here set energy consumption offset in (Wh) for lifetime net energy if nedded.
